subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Big Brown (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: For the second time in four years, trainer Nick Zito engineered the derailing of a Triple Crown bid when his Da’ Tara defeated Big Brown in the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: For the second time in four years, trainer Nick Zito engineered the derailing of a Triple Crown bid when his Da’ Tara defeated Big Brown in the Belmont Stakes.
